Returns: the array of @B_android#preview#support#wearable#notifications#RemoteInput_E@ objects associated with this action
getRemoteInputs().Description: Get a list of inputs to be collected from the user when this action is sent.

ClassDesc: Subclass of @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#Action_E@ that adds additional wearable extensions for actions. Always use the @B_android#preview#support#wearable#notifications#WearableNotifications#Action#Builder_E@ to build instances of this class and call @B_android#preview#support#wearable#notifications#WearableNotifications#Builder#addAction_E@ to add the action to a notification.
